radiographic_examinations.findings: The liver appears somewhat echogenic suggesting fatty infiltration. No focal hepatic mass lesions are seen. There is no evidence of intra- or extra-hepatic biliary dilatation. The common bile duct measures 2 mm. The gallbladder appears grossly unremarkable. There is no evidence of cholecystitis. The spleen measures 5.8 cm and appears grossly unremarkable.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: The liver again appeared somewhat echogenic suggesting fatty infiltration, similar to the prior exam.
